game.description: Retrieve the legendary Sword of Light from the depths of the Dark Forest.
game.objective: Retrieve the Sword of Light and bring it back to the village elder.

tasks.description: Gather information about the Dark Forest from the local villagers.
tasks.objective: Talk to at least three villagers about the Dark Forest.

tasks.description: Journey into the Dark Forest and retrieve the Sword of Light.
tasks.objective: Find the pedestal with the Sword of Light and take it.

tasks.description: Return to the village elder and hand over the Sword of Light.
tasks.objective: Talk to Village Elder Thorne and give him the sword.

game.title: The Quest for the Sword of Light
